name: Lynda RTS Game
description:
Go to full screen mode, part of the view is cut off in the web view. I.e. can't see the full map, can't see the

This is a larger WebGL, So it may take a moment to load...

Students of this course will learn to create a 3D Real Time Strategy game. This minimalist version will include several extras to give it a bit of polish in certain areas.

This course has received over 80k hits, and I thought I would post the playable version here. The point of the class is to teach you everything you need to create your own, but leaves a lot to your own extension. This is not set to easy play mode, but a mode to aid in debugging. I.e. we can see the enemies, earnings are fast.

You can get a free trial to Lynda.com to check out the course/source materials here (Please use that link, as I get commission on it. :D ).
